DOC.brief_summary: This randomized clinical trial is conducted to evaluate the effect of three intravitreal injections of bevasizumab versus two intravitreal injections of triamcinolone in acute central retinal vein occlusion. The outcomes are visual acuity and central macular thickness. The follow-up time is 6 months.
DOC.brief_title: Intravitreal Bevasizumab Versus Intravitreal Triamcinolone in Central Retinal Vein Occlusion (CRVO)
DOC.criteria: Recent onset (less than 3 months) central retinal vein occlusion Any previous intervention
